Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: I need to identify recurring activities in the event log and understand how their context changes.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I deduce that activities with similar names might serve different purposes depending on the case and position in the workflow.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Based on analyzing Case C001, I notice that 'Verify Documents' is context-dependent and requires renaming to 'Initial Document Verification' and 'Document Re-verification.'

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I validate my approach by applying the same reasoning to Case C002 and Case C003, ensuring consistent renaming logic.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: I use contextual clues like timestamps, resources, and additional notes to guide my renaming decisions without explicit domain knowledge.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I infer that renaming activities like 'Call Customer' to 'Initial Call to Request Documents' and 'Call to Recall Customer' clarifies their specific roles.

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - IND
Text: If I didn't rename these activities, it would be harder for readers to understand the workflow context.
